Attire

A Library for fast development and maintenance of structured templates, layouts and assets.

Install Latest Build

Currently v2.0.1

Attire is an implementation of a template engine combined with an asset management framework for CodeIgniter 3.0.

Features

Built on top of great technology.

Solid Base

Built with Twig Engine and Sprockets-PHP Framework.

Highly Customizable

Easily customize to work exactly how you want it to.

Extendable

The template system allows you to build multiple themes and layouts.

Manageable

Manage your assets, templates and layouts by taking care of preprocessors and dependencies.

Compressible

Build with minification and caching extensions.

Secure

Evaluate untrusted template code using a sandbox mode and output escaping.

Demo.

Fronted arquitecture in less of 2 minutes.
